column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////First visit I got the tonkatsu black ramen added spicy. Yessssss
column2: nothing beats ramen with a little kick.  The level of spicy includes mild
column4: and hot.  Spicy was just right.  I did the ramen combo which comes with a bowl of ramen a small appetizers and a small salad.  I got the crispy chicken as the side and it was juicy
column5: crispy and all meat. Salad is salad.  Now back to the ramen.  The tonkatsu black's garlic oil just slaps my palate.  I was disappointed that I didn't mix it well enough to the bottom.  Because once I hit the bottom of the bowl
column6: it was all spicy and no garlic oil.  I give that bowl of ramen 6 out of 5 stars.
